values: To resolve something means to find a solution.
She resolved the problem with her children by giving them both a toy.
vt.使分解，解析；解决，消除
v. to find an answer or solution to 解决
v. to make a definite and serious decision to do something 决定
n. a strong determination to do something 决心
tenacity

To resolve is to settle or solve a problem or conflict or to make a firm decision to do something.
Resolve means to settle or find a solution to a problem or dispute.
